adhoctranslation-source-lang-not-support:
Error message when the source language code is not supported by the translation service.

Parameters:
* $1 - Language code
adhoctranslation-target-lang-not-support:
Error message when the target language code is not supported by the translation service.

Parameters:
* $1 - Language code
adhoctranslation-target-exists: Error message when a page already exists in the requested target language.
adhoctranslation-same-lang: Error message when the source and target languages are the same.
adhoctranslation-ca-translate: Label for the action link that translates the page to the userâ€™s language.
adhoctranslation-ui-translating: Message displayed while translation is in progress.
adhoctranslation-ui-translated: Message displayed when the translation has been successfully loaded.
adhoctranslation-ui-error: Message displayed when the translation request fails.
adhoctranslation-ui-original: Link text for showing the original, untranslated page content.
adhoctranslation-not-configured: Error message when the translation service is not configured.
